definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: The paper studies dynamic characteristic for industrial steam turbine digital electro hydraulic governing system.
sentences.chinese: 研究了工業汽輪機數字電液調節系統的動態特性。

sentences.english: Then the steam passes into the turbine.
In Hanwang, there was a saying that it was enviable to be a worker ofDongfang.
sentences.chinese: 在漢旺，東方汽輪機廠的工人是很令人羨慕的。

sentences.english: Gradually, Li felt at home with the factory and the life.
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地，李萬勝把東方汽輪機廠當成了自己的家。

sentences.english: The paper presents a successful try-out of using the boundary element method for the stress analysis of a steam turbine rotor.
sentences.chinese: 採用邊界元法對汽輪機轉子的應力場進行分析。

sentences.english: The designed thinking of a complex CNC surface grinding machine for turbine cylinder is narrated briefly.
sentences.chinese: 概述了數控汽輪機缸體表面打磨機的設計思想。

sentences.english: All simulation is divided into individual part such as high-pressure casing and condenser, etc.
sentences.chinese: 將飽和蒸汽輪機的仿真研究分爲各個部件的計算。

sentences.english: On a street not far from the steam turbine factory, we could not see any house left intact.
sentences.chinese: 距離汽輪機廠不遠處的一條街道無一處完好的房屋。

sentences.english: The high temperature gas and the improvement of steam parameter make the lubricant run under much more severe conditions.
sentences.chinese: 汽輪機技術的發展使得汽輪機油的運行環境更加苛刻。

sentences.english: The high temperature gas and the improvement of steam parameter make the lubricant run under much more severe conditions.
sentences.chinese: 汽輪機技術的發展使得汽輪機油的運行環境更加苛刻。

sentences.english: A real time model to simulate the main steam system and turbine set is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種電站主蒸汽系統與汽輪機組實時仿真模型。

sentences.english: The internal leakage of low-pressure bypass is a common problem in steam turbine.
sentences.chinese: 低壓旁路的內漏是汽輪機組系統中普遍存在的問題。

sentences.english: The company is determined to rise above from the ruins once more to success.
sentences.chinese: 東方汽輪機公司決心在地震廢墟中站起來。

sentences.english: My whole life has been dedicated to and connected with Dongfang.
sentences.chinese: 我的一生都獻給了東方汽輪機廠。

sentences.english: The main characteristics of the overspeed protection system of supercritical steam turbines are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 重點分析超臨界汽輪機的超速保護系統的特點。

sentences.english: He was once an auto-machine room engineer in Shanghai Steam Turbine Company.
sentences.chinese: “他曾任上海汽輪機廠自控室工程師”用英文怎麼說？
